description: As discussed in http://bit.ly/wardpost, the City of Chicago changed to a new ward map on 5/18/2015, affecting some datasets.  This ZIP file contains CSV exports from 5/15/2015 of all datasets except Crimes - 2001 to present.  Due to size limitations, that CSV is at https://data.cityofchicago.org/d/5wdx-rdkp.  These CSV files contain the final or close-to-final versions of the datasets with the previous ("2003") ward values.

name: 2003 Ward Dataset CSVs - All Except Crimes - 2001 to present
